arts.sum: Bundesliga strugglers VfL Bochum announced the signing of Greek winger Georgios Masouras on Saturday.

arts.ttl: Official | Bochum introduce Georgios Masouras: “Always a goal to play in the Bundesliga.”
arts.sum: VfL Bochum confirmed the arrival of Greek attacker Georgios Masouras on Saturday evening.

arts.ttl: Union Berlin reach agreement to sign Marin Ljubicic; Maximilian Philipp next?
arts.sum: Matters continue to proceed fast and furiously with regard to incoming transfers at 1. FC Union Berlin.

arts.ttl: Sildillia's header secures crucial away win for Freiburg in Bochum
arts.sum: Killiann Sildillia's first-half header and a solid defensive display secured a 1-0 away victory for Freiburg against Bochum, who suffered their first home defeat of 2025. Sildillia's all-round display, combining attacking threat with defensive stability, was crucial in helping Freiburg end their three-match losing streak and secure a valuable away victory.

arts.ttl: 15:30 Kickoffs: Bayern avoid late scare, Augsburg snatch late point, away wins for Gladbach, Dortmund and Freiburg
arts.sum: In the 15:30 kickoffs on Bundesliga matchweek 20, pace-setters Bayern München avoided a late scare against Holstein Kiel, Borussia Mönchengladbach, Borussia Dortmund and Freiburg secured respective wins on the road, whilst Augsburg picked up a point on the road against St. Pauli.

arts.ttl: Official | Freiburg sign Benfica’s Jan-Niklas Beste
arts.sum: SC Freiburg officially unveiled Jan-Niklas Beste as a new signing on Friday afternoon.

arts.ttl: Niklas Beste: Who is the former Heidenheim maestro back in the Bundesliga with Freiburg?
arts.sum: An astonishing 12 goals and 13 assists saw Beste fire Heidenheim to a fairy-tale promotion, completing a rise from the regional leagues to the Bundesliga for the very first time. Heidenheim then signed Beste after finishing sixth in Bundesliga 2 under long-serving coach Frank Schmidt, and the rest is German football history!
SC Freiburg confirmed the signing of Jan-Niklas Beste on Friday.

arts.ttl: Niklas Beste completes Freiburg move from Benfica
arts.sum: Beste left Heidenheim in the summer of 2024, riding high on an eight-goal, 13-assist campaign that propelled the Bundesliga new boys into the UEFA Europa Conference League . "I remember the atmosphere at the Europa-Park Stadium from my last appearance and I'm looking forward to experiencing it as a Freiburg player.

arts.ttl: Dieter Hecking praises new Bochum signing Tom Krauß, Georgios Masouras to follow soon?
arts.sum: VfL Bochum confirmed the arrival of German youth international Tom Krauß on loan from Mainz yesterday. Germany's pre-eminent footballing publication reports that a new striker may be on the way soon.
